description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，曾任中国人民解放军火箭军副司令员。
description.en: A lieutenant general in the People's Liberation Army (PLA), former Deputy Commander of the PLA Rocket Force.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军国防科技大学外国语学院

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军国防科技大学外国语学院

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军国防科技大学下属的学院，是吴国华的母校，也是其早期任教和担任领导职务的地方。
description.en: A college under the National University of Defense Technology of the People's Liberation Army, it is Wu Guohua's alma mater where he also taught and held leadership positions early in his career.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京的语言类大学，吴国华于1988年在此获得俄语系硕士学位。
description.en: A language university located in Beijing, China, where Wu Guohua obtained his Master's degree in Russian in 1988.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国哈尔滨的综合性大学，吴国华在此获得俄语语言文学博士学位。
description.en: A comprehensive university in Harbin, China, where Wu Guohua obtained his Ph.D. in Russian Language and Literature.

description.zh-cn: 位于俄罗斯莫斯科的语言学院，吴国华在此获得俄罗斯联邦语文学博士学位。
description.en: A language institute in Moscow, Russia, where Wu Guohua obtained a Ph.D. in Philology from the Russian Federation.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军总参谋部技术侦察部

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总参谋部技术侦察部

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总参谋部下属的技术侦察部门，吴国华于2005年开始担任该部部长。
description.en: The technical reconnaissance department under the PLA General Staff Department, where Wu Guohua served as director starting in 2005.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军火箭军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军火箭军

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的战略导弹部队，前身为第二炮兵部队。吴国华曾担任该部队副司令员。
description.en: The strategic missile force of the People's Liberation Army, formerly known as the Second Artillery Corps. Wu Guohua served as its deputy commander.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的军衔，吴国华于2012年7月被授予此军衔。
description.en: A military rank in the People's Liberation Army, which was conferred upon Wu Guohua in July 2012.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家权力机关，吴国华于2018年当选为该届代表。
description.en: The highest state authority of the People's Republic of China. Wu Guohua was elected as a deputy to this congress in 2018.

nodes.id: 第十二届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十二届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家权力机关，根据页面分类，吴国华曾担任该届代表。
description.en: The highest state authority of the People's Republic of China. According to page categories, Wu Guohua served as a deputy to this congress.

description.zh-cn: 江苏省扬州市下辖区，是吴国华的出生地。
description.en: A district of Yangzhou City, Jiangsu Province, and the birthplace of Wu Guohua.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国首都，是吴国华的逝世地。
description.en: The capital of the People's Republic of China, and the place of Wu Guohua's death.

description.zh-cn: 据《星岛日报》报道，张小阳是吴国华的老上司，并透露其死因为自杀。
description.en: According to Sing Tao Daily, Zhang Xiaoyang was Wu Guohua's former superior and revealed that his cause of death was suicide.

description.zh-cn: 指2023年曝光的中国人民解放军火箭军高层系列腐败案件。吴国华的突然去世被外界普遍认为与此案有关。
description.en: Refers to a series of corruption cases involving high-ranking officials of the PLA Rocket Force exposed in 2023. Wu Guohua's sudden death is widely believed by the public to be related to this case.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军国防科技大学外国语学院

description.zh-cn: 1979年毕业于解放军外国语学院。
description.en: Graduated from the PLA Foreign Language Institute in 1979.

description.zh-cn: 1988年获北京外国语学院俄语系硕士学位。
description.en: Received a Master's degree in Russian from Beijing Foreign Studies University in 1988.

degree.en: Ph.D. in Russian Language and Literature

degree.zh-cn: 俄罗斯联邦语文学博士
degree.en: Ph.D. in Philology from the Russian Federation

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军国防科技大学外国语学院

position.zh-cn: 教员、第一系主任、教务长、副院长、院长
position.en: Instructor, Head of the First Department, Dean of Academic Affairs, Vice President, President

description.zh-cn: 毕业后留校任教，并历任多个领导职务。
description.en: After graduation, he stayed on to teach and held various leadership positions.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军总参谋部技术侦察部
中国人民解放军火箭军

description.zh-cn: 自2010年起担任第二炮兵部队副司令员，并在2015年部队改制为火箭军后继续担任副司令员，直至2020年退役。
description.en: Served as Deputy Commander of the Second Artillery Force since 2010, and continued in the role after its restructuring into the Rocket Force in 2015, until his retirement in 2020.

relationships.target: 第十二届全国人民代表大会
第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 《星岛日报》引述张小阳称其为吴国华的老上司。
description.en: Sing Tao Daily quoted Zhang Xiaoyang, who identified himself as Wu Guohua's former superior.

description.zh-cn: 吴国华的逝世时间与火箭军腐败案曝光时间相近，其死因（传闻为自杀）被外界认为可能与该案有关。
description.en: The timing of Wu Guohua's death coincided with the exposure of the Rocket Force corruption case, and his cause of death (rumored to be suicide) is considered by outsiders to be potentially related to the case.
